name: Arcanum of the Frosty Soul
htmlTooltip:
Arcanum of the Frosty Soul
Binds when picked up
Requires Level 80
Requires The Sons of Hodir - Honored
Use: Permanently adds 25 Frost resist and 30 Stamina to a head slot item.

Enchanting the item causes it to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 37 50
